name: GUN SPIRITS -English Version
description:
“Please save the fairy world with your guns!”

Evil force “AmagumoDan” can only be stopped by the sacred weapon Guns.
Future of the fairy world(Iltunia) is all depending on “Spiry” the fairy of Guns.

▼▲▼ “Gun Spirits” is a Kawaii gun action RPG ▼▲▼

Director Kotarou Yoshida is known for creating "HALF-MINUTE HERO -"

“Gun Spirits” was ranked number one on Japanese ranking “Paid RPG category” and “Paid Action game category” in September 2013.
This simple “Kawaii gun action RPG” can be played by single hand, and must feel the satisfaction of shooting!

▽△▽ How to play　▽△▽

▼Basic Control
It is very simple, all you need to do is drag!
Move Spiry and fight against the enemy!!

▼Enhance your guns!
Spiry holds guns on both hands to attack.
Select the weapons most effective to the enemy, and power it up.

▼Enhance your wings!
Choose the wings according to the enemy type.
Increase the speed and defense to protect Spiry.

▼One point advise
Wings has different weights.
With heavy weapons, Spiry cannot fly fast.

▼Available model
iPhone 4S and avove.

▼iOS
6.1 and later

▼Other
This game do not require network to play after downloading.
